name: Vayunnn
greetingText: I reallyyyyy like your name btw!
wishText: May this year be ur year !!
textInChatBox: A very happy birthdayyyyy to youu!!! YAYYYYYY! I loveee youuu SOooo MUCHhhhhh...
text2: ❤️Youreee the best boyfriendddd in the world❤️
text3: I'm pretty lucky to be able to celebrate a boyfriend like you
wishHeading: Happy Birthday to the first man i've ever loved!
outroText: Okay, now come back on ig and tell me that you liked it hehe
